posts.post_content:
Lessor Grade T202's To Trade

Hi, I've a two lessor graded T202s to trade (both pictured below).  My preference is for T202s in similar condition or other pre-war hits to my wantlist (below)


My Needs, Looking for one of each middle panel, regardless of who is on the end panels. I NEED: A Desperate Slide for Third, Ambrose McConnell At Bat, Baker Gets His Man, Carrigan Blocks His Man, Catching Him Napping, Chase Guarding First, Chase Safe At Third, Chief Bender Waiting for a Good One, Clarke Hikes For Home, Close At Third -Speaker, Elberfeld Beats the Throw, Engle In A Close Play, Fast Work At Third, Good Play At Third, Hal Chase Too Late, Harry Lord At Third, Hartsel Strikes Out, Held At Third, Jake Stahl Guarding First, Jim Delahanty At Bat, Knight Catches A Runner, Lobert Gets Tenney, Lord Catches His Man, McIntyre At Bat, Nearly Caught, Oldring Almost Home, Scrambling Back To First, Speaker Rounding Third, Speaker Scores, Stahl Safe, Sweeney Gets Stahl, Tom Jones At Bat, Wheat Strikes Out
